Update_Variables_in_varPreviousPapEmailB.inputs:
@replace(
replace(
replace(
replace(
    replace(
        replace(
            variables('varPreviousPapEmailBody'),
            '%outgoingPAPName%',
            variables('varOutgoingPAPName')
        ),
        '%buildingName%',
        variables('varBuidlingName')
    ),
    '%newPAPname%',
    variables('varNewPAPName')
),
'%buildingapplicationreference%',
variables('varBuildingApplicationReference')
),
'%outgoingPAPOrgLeadContactName%',
variables('varOutgoingPAPOrgLeadContactName')
),
'%newPAPOrgLeadContactname%',
variables('varNewPAPOrgLeadContactname')
)
